item.description:
Since many of us are well-travelled, have lived in another country, or just love international cuisine, I'd like to host an international supper on April 24th. You are welcome bring either a foreign nibble of some sort, a foreign drink, or prepare some sort of musical or other performance from another country if you're in the mood. Choices are limitless, really.

If you RSVP yes, please let me know if you're thinking of bringing something so I can balance the menu accordingly.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: An International Night @Victoria's
